document.docAuthor: Barrios-Izás, Manuel A., Anderson, Robert S. & Morrone, Juan J.
document.docTitle: Plumolepilius canoi Barrios-Izas & Anderson, new species
document.masterDocTitle: A taxonomic monograph of the leaf-litter inhabiting weevil genus Plumolepilius new genus (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Molytinae: Conotrachelini) from Mexico, Guatemala, and El Salvador

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A taxonomic monograph of the leaf-litter inhabiting weevil genus Plumolepilius new genus (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Molytinae: Conotrachelini) from Mexico, Guatemala, and El Salvador

heading.emphasis:
Plumolepilius canoi Barrios-Izás & Anderson
, new species

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution. Guatemala (Zacapa and Chiquimula). Fig. 101 .
Derivation of the specific name. Patronym, named after Enio B. Cano, a coleopterist at Universidad del Valle in Guatemala City.

Material examined. 33ƋƋ, 45♀♀ (ASUHIC, BMNH, CMNC, CWOB, MNCN, URLC, USAC, USNM, UVGC). Holotype Ƌ (CMNC):
